info.title: LaravelVueErp API
info.description: API Documentation for LaravelVueErp Project Management System

get.summary: Get materials data for a task
get.description: Retrieves materials data including project elements and their materials for a specific task

post.summary: Save materials data for a task
post.description: Saves or updates materials data including project elements and their materials for a specific task

get.summary: Get materials data by enquiry ID
get.description: Retrieves materials data for an enquiry by finding the materials task
Retrieves all active element templates with their default materials

post.description: Creates a new element template with default materials

get.summary: Get all users with pagination and filters

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, email, or employee name

post.summary: Create a new user from employee

get.summary: Get list of available employees for user creation

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by employee name or email

get.summary: Get list of project officers for enquiry assignment
Get all enquiries with pagination and filters

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by title, client name, or contact person

description.example: Complete branding solution for new office

project_scope.example: Logo design, signage, and interior branding

get.summary: Get all enquiry tasks with filtering and search

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by task title or enquiry title

get.summary: Get tasks for a specific enquiry

notes.example: Please complete by end of week

403.description: Unauthorized - Only Project Managers can assign tasks

post.summary: Reassign task to a different user

403.description: Unauthorized - Only Project Managers can reassign tasks

ElementMaterial.title: Element Material
ElementMaterial.description: A material used in a project element

ElementMaterialInput.description: Input data for creating/updating an element material

isDefaultIncluded.description: Whether material is included by default

isDefaultIncluded.description: Whether material is included by default
